price: Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who do good.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْ وَّٱلَّذِينَ هُم مُّحۡسِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
